name: Magical Forest Hut
description: An origami building that exemplifies the style of the Forest of Blessings. It has the same appearance as the Hut of Blessings, with its roof resembling a giant paper magic hat, filling those who approach with a sense of anticipation. It is said that the "Simulanka's Goddess of Creation" once worked here, and gave the Forest of Blessings life. Perhaps the peculiar appearance of this hut is linked to the real identity of the Goddess of Creation...
